justification: The resume reflects strong technical skills but does not indicate any leadership or business development experience which is crucial for this role.
No mention of relevant strategic planning experience according to job requirements.
Without details of work in market research, negotiation or sales strategy, micro scores fall low in these areas.
The resume leans heavily towards technical prowess in data science and machine learning, which is not aligned with the job description's focus on sales and strategic skills.

requirements.criteria: Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills
5+ years of business development experience in a leadership role
Proficiency in business analytics and digital strategy
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

input.job_description:
**Business Development Manager**  
Join [Fictional Company] as a Business Development Manager, where you will lead strategies for expanding our market presence. Responsibilities include driving sales growth, developing key client relationships, and implementing innovative solutions to improve efficiencies using data-driven insights.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Identify new business opportunities and potential clients through market research and networking.
- Develop strategies to enhance business processes, improve workflows, and maximize operational efficiency.
- Work collaboratively with senior management to provide strategic recommendations based on market analysis.
- Lead and mentor a team of business development professionals, focusing on achieving company sales targets.
- Engage in high-stakes negotiation and strategy discussions with existing and potential partners.

**Preferred Skills:**

- Proficiency in business analytics tools like GA4 and Power BI.
- Strong capability in digital marketing strategies including SEO and influencer marketing.
- Expertise in using CRM tools such as JIRA and Asana.

**Our Ideal Candidate:**

You are proactive, strategic, and data-oriented with a firm background in business development and a passion for driving sales excellence. You are eager to lead and inspire a team while focusing on achieving ambitious growth targets.

Join us and be a part of a collaborative environment driving innovation and success.

[Apply Now]
input.additional_info: [Fictional Company] values candidates from top-tier universities such as [University A] and [University B]. We support diversity and inclusion in our hiring processes. Relocation assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis. We assess skills through a combination of technical interviews, case studies, and practical tests to ensure the candidate’s fitment with the organizational culture and job requirements.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills
5+ years of business development experience in a leadership role
Proficiency in business analytics and digital strategy
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

MUHAMMAD HASEEB JAVAID
Machine Learning Engineer | Data Scientist
haseebj345@gmail.com /ne(+92) 3137701944 Islamabad, Pakistan /♀nednmuhammad-haseeb-javaid
With 3 years of experience in machine learning, computer vision, data science, NLP, and Python programming, I am
passionate about enhancing my skills and reaching new heights in the software ﬁeld. I am conﬁdent in my ability to
contribute eﬀectively to your team, leveraging my expertise in Python programming and cutting-edge technologies to
develop and implement machine learning models and data-driven solutions.
WORK EXPERIENCE
AI/ML Engineer
RAPIDEV
ὌMay 2022 – March 2024 Islamabad, Pakistan
•Developed and Deployed Weapon Detection System
- Data Collection
- Data Preprocessing of Images
- Data Annotation on CVAT/Roboﬂow
- Custom Model Fine-tuning on YoloV5.
- Conversion of custom pre-trained model to TensorRT (engine ﬁle).
- Build and manage the end-to-end NVIDIA DeepStream AI pipeline.
- AI service Deployment on SMART servers from Dev, Staging to Production
Server.
The application comprises two core services: the Recorder Service,
dedicated to capturing real-time feeds from CCTV cameras or drone
cameras, and the Deepstreamer Service, which employs three TensorRT
models—Crowd Detection, Prescriptive Detection, and Drone Detection.
The Deepstreamer Service conducts advanced object detection, identifying
both Military and Non-Military objects in CCTV camera or drone feeds.
Notably, it specializes in crowd pattern analysis, enhancing situational
awareness for security and safety.
•Developed Object Detection System for high-resolution imagery
- Data Collection of high-resolution satellite imagery.
- Data Preprocessing like crop of images using SAHI.
- Data Annotation on CVAT.
- Custom Model Fine-tuning (1280) on YoloV5.
- Build and manage the end-to-end FAST API pipeline.
- AI service Deployment on SMART servers from Dev, Staging to Production
Server.
The reconnaissance detection model implemented in this pipeline utilizes
the SAHI slice prediction technique on raster images to discern various
vehicle types, including civilian vehicles, military vehicles, military trucks,
and military tanks. Subsequently, the model outputs bounding boxes around
the detected vehicles. To enhance the practical applicability of the results,
all bounding boxes are transformed into geo boxes using the geographical
data embedded in the raster image. The pipeline is developed using FastAPI.
•Facial Recognition System Facial Recognition
System is implemented and deployed to track and detect anomalies on live
camera feed, where vector database was used to store embeddings. For
that, I used the retinaface pre-trained model for face detection.
•Developed and Deployed Smoke & Fire Detection System
For Fire and smoke detection, I trained a model for ﬁre detection. For that,
we gathered images of ﬁre and smoke.
•Developed and Deployed Drone Detection System
Trained YOLOV8 on our own created drone dataset and created its micro
service (API) using Fast API dockeriezed it and deployed on GPU Server.SKILLS
